name: My Chrome Extension Skeleton Sample
description: Chrome Extension Skeleton Sample for training purposes
author: Juan Diego Pérez Jiménez
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; connect-src http://www.zaragoza.es https://maps.googleapis.com; img-src https://maps.google.com;script-src https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?v=3.exp&signed_in=true https://maps.gstatic.com/maps-api-v3/api/js/20/11a/intl/es_ALL/main.js  https://maps.gstatic.com/maps-api-v3/api/js/20/11a/intl/es_ALL/main.js
